author: Marina Meila and Michael I. Jordan
title: Learning with Mixtures of Trees
window: on. 5.2 Density estimation experiments 5.2.1 digits and digit pairs images Our first density estimation experiment involved a subset of binary vector representations of handwritten digits. The datasets consist of normalized and quantized 8×8 binary images of handwritten digits made available by the US Postal Service Office for Advanced Technology.
